page.title: 11TOURISM - HOTELS
page.content:
Barney Maclennan Age 6
My dad is the manager of the Loch Ericht Hotel. We live in the hotel flat. My mum is a typist. I have 2 dogs. There are 27 bedrooms, a public bar, cocktail bar and the dining room. We get coach tours from National Holidays, Trafalgar Tours and Ski buses. We get school parties, ski clubs and old people coming on holiday. My dad has a boat on the loch.
Eilidh Henderson Age 5
I live at the Grampian Hotel. My gran lives down the road. We have tour buses. I go to school. It is good.
